body:
Signed-off-by: m.nabokikh <maksim.nabokikh@flant.com>

## Description
Use bearer token to request metrics

## Why do we need it, and what problem does it solve?
There are three problems:
1. We need to issue client certificates for Prometheus (not a big deal, because we already have the code for it).
2. Prometheus reloads client certificates only if targets were changed (or are gone).
3. There is no way to revoke certificates issued by Kubernetes.

body: ## Description Recognize slash commands in release issue comments to run build, e2e, deploy and suspend workflows. Disable auto-build for release-X.Y branches to ease cherry-picking and prevent unnecessary rebuilds. Small fixes: - Remove concurrency section for deploy, suspend and e2e. - Do not create release issue for milestones without version in title. More details: - auto build with commenting only for main branch, test tags and release tags - auto build for dev-* and pr-* tags - add commands description to the first comment for newly created release issues - one workflow for handling comments: dispatch-slash-command - cleanup: remove check labels for deploy-channel, suspend-channel ## Why do we need it, and what problem does it solve? Support release process without curl and labels. Slash commands give control over used ref. ## Changelog entries ```changes section: ci type: feature summary: Add slash command for workflow in release issues impact_level: low impact: | - use slash commands in comments on release issue to run deploy, suspend and e2e workflows - no auto build for release-X.Y branches - support test-v* tags to run tests after cherry-picking - auto-build dev-* and pr-* tags for developer needs ```

title: [deckhouse] refactor update mechanism
body:
## Description
Refactor update mechanism

## Why do we need it, and what problem does it solve?
The update mechanism is too complicated, mixing the "check" and the "apply" logic together. We can split this logic by waves:
1. Prepare releases (patch statuses)
2. Calculate the next possible release
3. Check this release
4. Apply it

## Changelog entries
<!---
  Describe the changes so they will be included in a release changelog.
  Find examples and documentation below.
-->

type: fix
description: More controllable and transparent release process
